tool.name: SpaceTimeCorrelation

param.name: detectionFC
param.dialogReference: The polygon feature class containing bounding boxes or outlines of detections from an image.
param.pythonReference: The polygon feature class containing bounding boxes or outlines of detections from an image.

param.name: detectionTimeField
param.dialogReference: The field name of the detection feature class field containing the time information of the detections.
param.pythonReference: The field name of the detection feature class field containing the time information of the detections.

param.name: tracksFC
param.dialogReference: The point feature class containing the track data to be matched to the detections.
param.pythonReference: The point feature class containing the track data to be matched to the detections.

param.name: trackIDField
param.dialogReference: The field name of the track feature class field containing the unique id of the track points.
param.pythonReference: The field name of the track feature class field containing the unique id of the track points.

param.name: trackTimeField
param.dialogReference: The field name of the track feature class field containing the time information of the track points.
param.pythonReference: The field name of the track feature class field containing the time information of the track points.

param.name: outputFeatures
param.dialogReference: The name of the output polygon feature class. The output will match the input detections but will also include spatial join information of tracks that can correlated to detections in space and time.
param.pythonReference: The name of the output polygon feature class. The output will match the input detections but will also include spatial join information of tracks that can correlated to detections in space and time.

param.name: distanceTolerance
param.dialogReference: The search distance for spatially proximity in Meters. Tracks that pass within this threshold distance to the detections will also be evaluated for temporal matching.
param.pythonReference: The search distance for spatially proximity in Meters. Tracks that pass within this threshold distance to the detections will also be evaluated for temporal matching.

tool.summary: Space Time Correlation will take an input feature class of detections and feature class of track data and attempt to correlate tracks to detections in both space and time.
